task.title: Create the Directory URL
task.abstract: The same directory can be related to any number of Sites on the same org. Each relationship is given a unique Site ID. The Site ID is incorporated into the Directory URL.

context.p: To build the directory URL, you must first relate the directory to a Site. This generates the Directory Site ID key = SD-00000000.
1. Navigate from the Directory to the Site that relates to the Site ID key. You can use one of the URLs auto-generated for this site as a guide:
4. Append Site Directory ID: autonumber=SD-00000000 (site specific)
